DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Consensus Review Received Protocol Information Office Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when the Protocol Information Office (PIO) received the Consensus Review.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Consensus Review Received Protocol Information Office
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a writing that contains information about a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people and the agreement as the result of multiple results or opinions received by the office within the Division of Cancer Prevention which provides administrative support for clinical trial development and tracking by abstraction of key elements into a web-based relational database, monitoring trial timelines and activity from trial proposal to close-out, supporting document review and agent meetings, and developing metrics for program evaluation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A writing that contains information.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredName: Consensus Review Received Protocol Information Office
Property.preferredDefinition: Agreement as the result of multiple results or opinions.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.:Received; taken, gotten, or acquired.:The office within the Division of Cancer Prevention which provides administrative support for clinical trial development and tracking by abstraction of key elements into a web-based relational database, monitoring trial timelines and activity from trial proposal to close-out, supporting document review and agent meetings, and developing metrics for program evaluation.

Concepts.definition: Agreement as the result of multiple results or opinions.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

An office within NCI which provides administrative support for clinical trial development and tracking by abstraction of key elements into a web-based relational database, monitoring trial timelines and activity from trial proposal to close-out, supporting document review and agent meetings, and developing metrics for program evaluation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
